Line1.EDC71: Ran hard and fast from my old crew. They wanted to set up shop in Wejinhani and I want out. I can’t live in the swamp. I can’t stay and I can’t leave without money.
Line3.EDC71: Found these warrens by accident, but what a treasure. I can sell everything I find and leave. But there’s someone else—more than one person—here. Hunting for something. And I think if they find me, it won’t go well.
